name: portable-storybook-service
description: A portable Storybook upload service for Cloudflare Workers and Node.js

scripts.dev:node: npm run build && npm run start:node
scripts.e2e:node: concurrently "npm run dev:node" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && vitest run e2e --env node"
scripts.e2e:worker: concurrently "npm run dev:worker" "wait-on http://localhost:8787 && vitest run e2e --env worker"
scripts.e2e:docker: docker build -t storybook-service . && docker run -p 3000:3000 -d storybook-service && wait-on http://localhost:3000 && vitest run e2e --env docker && docker stop $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=storybook-service)
scripts.ci:deploy-and-validate: npm run deploy:worker && npm run validate:deployment

author: Jules
